definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: I counted four battleships definitely sunk, three severely damaged.
sentences.chinese: 我數了一數，有四艘主力艦無疑已經沉沒，三艘重創。

sentences.english: That means SEVEN capital ships in a single fleet.
sentences.chinese: 這意味着一支艦隊可包含七艘主力艦。

sentences.english: The new battle ship will be armed with 16 inch guns.
sentences.chinese: 那艘新的主力艦將配備口徑16英寸的大炮。

sentences.english: In modern wars, capital ships have a very important function.
sentences.chinese: 現代戰爭中主力艦的作用舉足輕重。

sentences.english: The signatories also agreed to an unprecedented 10-year holiday in the construction of new capital ships.
sentences.chinese: 締約國還同意在今後十年內不建造新的主力艦。
